00016 #define SVG_MIME_CONTENT_TYPE_NA         0
00017 
00018 // MIME types for images must have bit 7 set (0x80)
00019 #define SVG_MIME_CONTENT_TYPE_IMAGE      0x80
00020 #define SVG_MIME_CONTENT_TYPE_IMAGE_JPEG 0x81
00021 #define SVG_MIME_CONTENT_TYPE_IMAGE_PNG  0x82
00022 #define SVG_MIME_CONTENT_TYPE_IMAGE_GIF  0x83
00023 #define SVG_MIME_CONTENT_TYPE_IMAGE_WBMP 0x84
00024 #define SVG_MIME_CONTENT_TYPE_IMAGE_SVG  0x85
00025 
00026 #define SVG_MIME_CONTENT_TYPE_IS_IMAGE(CT) ((CT) & SVG_MIME_CONTENT_TYPE_IMAGE)
00027
